# Jeremiah Aworetan - Personal Website

> Frontend engineer building scalable web solutions for seamless user experiences. This website showcases my portfolio of projects, including web applications, landing pages, and development tools.

This website contains information about my work as a frontend engineer, including project showcases, contact information, and professional details. The site is built with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://jeremy0x.dev/): Personal introduction and overview
- [Projects](https://jeremy0x.dev/projects): Portfolio showcasing web development projects including crypto payment solutions, e-commerce platforms, and custom websites
- [Contact](https://jeremy0x.dev/contact): Contact form and information

## Projects

- [Noblocks](https://noblocks.xyz): Next-gen crypto payment solution with zero gas fees. Advanced crypto payment platform eliminating P2P transaction complexity. Built with Next.js, TypeScript, and Framer Motion.

- [Paycrest Dashboard](https://paycrest.io): Interface for interacting with the Paycrest protocol. Dashboard application providing comprehensive control and monitoring of Paycrest protocol interactions.

- [Noblocks Blog](https://noblocks.xyz/blog): Blog platform powered by Sanity.io for Noblocks. Content management system using headless CMS with dynamic content rendering and SEO optimization.

- [BahamaFoodie](http://hellobahamafoodie.com): Digital plant-based restaurant platform in the Bahamas. Features menu browsing, online ordering, and delivery tracking. Built with vanilla JavaScript and GSAP animations.

- [Salvage Yard Store](https://www.salvageyardstore.com): Dual-sided e-commerce platform for electronic devices. Features inventory management, real-time stock updates, customer accounts, and order tracking.

- [Paycrest](https://paycrest.io): Decentralized payment protocol for crypto-to-fiat transactions. Cutting-edge payment protocol bridging cryptocurrency and traditional fiat. Built with Remix.js and TypeScript.

- [Shape Up Fitness](https://shapeupfitnessonline.com): Platform showcasing fitness services and gym facilities. Features facility showcases, service listings, schedules, and trainer profiles.

- [Mindlar](https://mindlar.com): Landing page for a learning community. Features engaging design that communicates community values and offerings.

- [Zap by Paycrest](https://zap-beta.jeremy0x.dev/): Hackathon-winning crypto payment solution (Deprecated). Initial Paycrest payment solution from Based Africa hackathon demonstrating core crypto-to-fiat functionality.

- [Sentinel Finance](https://sentfi.jeremy0x.dev): Decentralized commerce platform with payment integration. Proof-of-concept dCommerce platform combining e-commerce with blockchain technology.

- [Lync](https://thelync.app): Landing page for Lync product. Features modern design and clear product communication.

- [Valtrix](https://valtrix.jeremy0x.dev/): Official website showcasing blockchain solutions. Features clean, professional design with smooth animations.

- [Sesshin](https://sesshin.jeremy0x.dev): Custom brand website with immersive animations. Features GSAP-powered animations with modern design principles.

- [$Dogatoshi](https://dogatoshi.jeremy0x.dev/): Informative website for $Dogatoshi meme coin community. Community website providing project information and details with engaging UI.

- [Elder Wallet](https://elderwallet.jeremy0x.dev): Proof of concept Bitcoin wallet with Runes Network support. Bitcoin wallet demo showcasing Runes Network protocol integration.

- [MentorMeInTech Waitlist](https://mentormeintech.jeremy0x.dev): Waitlist platform for MentorMeInTech mentorship program. Connects tech professionals with aspiring developers.

- [foodieFetch](https://foodie-fetch.jeremy0x.dev): Recipe finder app based on available ingredients. Personal project helping users discover meals with ingredient search and filtering.

- [LingoLookup](https://lingolookup.jeremy0x.dev): Comprehensive dictionary app with advanced features. Features definitions, synonyms, antonyms, pronunciation, and examples.

- [Mullti](https://mullti.jeremy0x.dev): Dual-sided e-commerce platform with unique design. Features product catalog, shopping cart, authentication, and order management.

- [Sways](https://sways.jeremy0x.dev): Custom Dutch brand website with modern design. Features minimalist design and smooth animations with responsive layout.

## Optional

- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/jeremy0x): Source code repositories and contributions
- [LinkedIn](https://linkedin.com/in/jeremy0x): Professional network profile
